Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
check=true
debris=game:GetService("Debris") cooldown=14 amount=9
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local chr=sp.Parent if chr and check then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t and h and h.Health>0 then check=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" sp.Handle.Transparency=1 for i=1,amount do local m=Instance.new("Model") m.Name="Arachnix Drone" local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.Friction=.2 p.Name="Torso" p.Transparency=0 p.CanCollide=true p.CFrame=CFrame.new() local rd=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*15,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*15) p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd p.Velocity=rd p.Parent=m local he=Instance.new("Part") he.Name="Head" he.formFactor="Custom" he.Transparency=1 he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.Parent=m local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Name="Neck" w.Part0=p w.Part1=he w.Parent=p local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=5 h.Health=5 h.WalkSpeed=20 h.Parent=m local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Name="creator" ct.Parent=m local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=m s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(m,20) m.Parent=game.Workspace p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd end wait(cooldown) sp.Handle.Transparency=0 mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=2
alive=true
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
head=waitfor(sp,"Head") hum=waitfor(sp,"Humanoid") torso=waitfor(sp,"Torso") ct=waitfor(sp,"creator")
torso.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.Name~=sp.Name and alive then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then return end end h:TakeDamage(damage) end end end)
hum.Changed:connect(function(prop) if hum then if hum.Health<=0 then alive=false if torso then hum:remove() local f=Instance.new("Fire") f.Parent=torso if head then head:remove() end wait(2) end sp:remove() end else alive=false sp:remove() end end)
while alive do closest=1000 target=nil for i,v in ipairs(game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do --targets every thing named humanoid that is in a model in workspace and is not another drone if v and v.className=="Model" and v.Name~=sp.Name then local t=v:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=v:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t~=nil and h~=nil and h.Health>0 then safe=false local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(v) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then safe=true end end if not safe then local mag=(t.Position-torso.Position).magnitude if mag<closest then target=t closest=mag end end end end end if target then point=target.Position+Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5) --hum.WalkToPoint=point hum:MoveTo(point,target) if math.random()<.25 then hum.Jump=true end end wait(.5+math.random()) end
